I am an assistant professor in the [Statistics, Measurement, and Evaluation in Education](https://education.missouri.edu/educational-school-counseling-psychology/degrees-programs/statistics-measurement-evaluation-education/) program at the College of Education and Human Development of the University of Missouri. 

Specific research interests include:

* Bayesian methods
* Structural equation modeling
* Longitudinal data
* Measurement

You can find an overview of my publications and talks by clicking on the links above. You can also look at my [full CV](static/winter_cv_2023.pdf).
